resources.string: Please put in the same name you used in whatsapp to get a notification when someone mentions you.\nCopy the exact name from Whatsapp with emojis (if used) for better results

string-array.name: welcome_text
string-array.item: Browse through your important messages that you might have missed during a conversation
Now conveniently text an unknown number on whatsapp without saving it
Select important contacts as Elite Members and directly view their messages
Get notified when someone sends an important message or mentions you, so you dont miss out on something important
One stop destination for all your whatsapp media

resources.string: Our core idea is to try and make sure that you do cover up majority of those important messages and let internet be less harsh on you.

WatSights scans your message notifications and stores them locally in a database on your device. This database is only accessible to you through this app and no one (not even other apps on your phone) has access to those messages. When someone sends you a message, you get a notification. This app reads the text in the notification and determines if the message is important or not using keywords. It searches for possible combinations like links, phone numbers, email addresses, meeting links, etc. Similarly it listens for media changes when a new media is added on your phone and if the media is deleted, it is copied in a folder on your phone. So even if the person deletes it, you still have access to that media.
Elite members are those who you think are important and don’t want to miss their messages. Select important contacts as Elite Members and directly view their messages
Spammers are those people who spam a lot of messages and their messages are not so important.
Q. Why do you need notification access?
The main objective of this app is to filter out important messages from the spam ones. In order to read those messages, this app requires notification access.
Q. Why do you need storage access?
This app lets you to view Whatsapp media and delete pointless stickers and gifs, we need access to manage your data. This does not let the app delete anything without your permission
Q. Can you see my messages?

WatSights scans your message notifications and stores them locally in a database on your device. This database is only accessible to you through this app and no one (not even other apps on your phone) has access to those messages. You can even turn on biometrics to prevent unauthoried access to those messages
Q. How can we contact you?
You can contact us through our mail id yashkasera@icloud.com or you can visit our website for more assistance
Your privacy is important to us. It is Watsights policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect from you through our app and other sites we own and operate.

This app is totally offline. We do not collect any data from you, not even your name. All data used by this app is stored locally on your phone and will be removed when you uninstall the app. It may contain external links which will redirect you to web pages which are not owned by us.

Our app may link to external apps that are not operated by us. Please be aware that we have no control over the content and practices of these apps, and cannot accept responsibility or liability for their respective privacy policies.
You are free to refuse our request for notification and storage access, with the understanding that we may be unable to provide you with some of your desired services.

Your continued use of our app will be regarded as acceptance of our practices around privacy and personal information. If you have any questions regarding anything related to this app please feel free to contact us.
For more details about our privacy policy, please visit our website.
If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, You can contact us: \nBy email: yashkasera@icloud.com
This policy is effective as of 9th April 2021.

Before proceeding, there are a few things we\'d like to request for this app to work properly.
Have any suggestions or queries? We\'d love to hear it from you. You can write to us directly at yashkasera@icloud.com or you can use the form below :
Browse through your important messages that you might have missed during a conversation

Tired of saving numbers to your Contacts for sharing just a line of text? We have a solution for that. Use our direct message feature to directly send message to a number without saving it in your phone

This will delete all the messages and media you have downloaded through this app. This includes status video downloads, deleted media and all the messages.\nThis action cannot be undone. Do you still want to proceed?
This will clear all the groups,members and messages (including pinned and important) and resets the status of al the members.\nThis action cannot be undone. Do you still want to proceed?
